title: Rank queue disable
body: Hey guys, why are rank queues still being disabled from 4-8am, the OCE server has been out for nearly 2 years now. Surely there are enough players with similar MMR to play with during those hours, even if there are few, most of us wouldn't mind having to wait 10 minutes for a rank game, rather than not being given the choice at all.

replies.body:
Heh.

Have you seen the discussions about Dominion?
